articles.author: Julia Musto
articles.title: Weight loss in older adults associated with risk of death, study shows - Fox News
articles.description: A new study that followed healthy older Australian and U.S. adults concluded that weight loss may increase their risk of death, including life-limiting conditions.
articles.content:
Weight loss in older adults may increase their risk of death, according to new research. 
A cohort study published in the journal JAMA Network Open Monday looked at more than 16,000 adults in the U.… [+2157 chars]
